description:
This updated version of the Kids Ride Shotgun seat leaves your frame out of the connection. Just like the classic kid’s seat, the Pro seat puts your little ripper in the center of the action, only now the seat doesn’t mount to your frame. This seat lets you to share your love of riding trails with the next generation. The padded seat and grippy foot pegs give your tiny passenger a secure base to grab your handlebars and enjoy the ride. Installation is easy. And, once your have fit the MTB frame seat to your bike, removal and remounting are quick and tool-free.

  • Designed for kids from 2-5 years old and up to 27kg (60lb)
  • Comfortable, padded seat is easy to adjust
  • Grippy foot pegs have adjustable straps to prevent slippage
  • Zero frame contact, crossbar attaches to your seat post and your steerer tube (all 1 1/8 in.)
  • Adjustable seat angle, witch and leg length let this seat fit most mountain bike frames, even e-MTBs
  • Quick release fitting makes mounting and removal easy
  • Requires 10mm of clearance under the stem. Bikes with stems shorter than 50mm in length may require additional clearance under the stem
  • Requires 14mm of exposed seat post
  • 2 x 10mm spacers included for mounting on 2 bikes
name: Kids Ride Shotgun Pro Seat
